DOC.brief_summary: In last decade , several author propose ultrasound measurement Bladder wall thickness ( BWT ) screen void dysfunction detrusor overactivity ( DO ) . The aim investigator prospective study : - compare ultrasonographic measurement BWT woman DO v woman urodynamic diagnosis large population . - verify whether BWT woman DO different clinically urodinamically different form DO .
DOC.brief_title: Ultrasonographic Bladder Wall Thickness Different Forms Detrusor Overactivity
DOC.criteria: All woman refer Urogynecology Unit January 2005 December 2008 symptom OAB , stress urinary incontinence mixed incontinence sottoposte prove urodinamiche complete include prospective study The investigator exclude woman document recurrent urinary tract infection Previous antimuscarinic treatment Previous pelvic surgery Neurological disease Vaginal prolapse > I stage Symptoms clinical and/or urodynamic sign void dysfunction Patients include ongoing clinical trial study period .
